summary: "Married... with Children" is an American TV sitcom that aired on Fox from 1987 to 1997. It's about the Bundys, a dysfunctional family living in Chicago: Al, a shoe salesman and former football player; his wife Peggy; their daughter Kelly, who's pretty but not very smart; and their witty son Bud. The show also features their neighbors, the Rhoades, and later, Marcy's husband Jefferson, who becomes Al's sidekick. With 11 seasons and 259 episodes, it's one of the longest-running sitcoms in TV history. The show was known for its adult humor and was different from other family sitcoms of that time.
title: Married... with Children
